title: Survival on Raft: Ocean Nomad - Simulator
description:
Ocean Nomad is a new release in the series of ocean survival games with new enemies, items, rpg elements, survival on an island and ocean exploration on a boat. Build and upgrade your raft for survival in the sea, defend it from sharks and explore the vast world around. Try all our awesome survival simulator games rolled into one! 

Features of our game:

‚òÜhundreds of weapons and items
‚òÜopen world exploration
‚òÜrealistic 3D HD - graphics
‚òÜsurvival on islands
‚òÜimproved raft building

Tips for apocalypse survival:

üåäCatch items and resources with you hook

Lots of useful resources in shark games are right under your nose. Chest and barrels floating around always contain vital resources for survival on in the sea and wreckages are really good material for raft building in ocean games. You might even find items, tools and weapons for defense of the raft, so keep on throwing the hook!

üî´Craft weapons and armor

A prey can easily change the rules and become a hunter in shark games. Make a hard choice among hundreds of guns, two - handed blade weapons and armor parts to defend you floating base and hunt sharks. Craft a perfect arsenal and always be ready for the battle. 

‚õµÔ∏èDefend your raft

Be ready to evolve and fight for survival in the sea with a double effort, now that you‚Äôve got one more problem to deal with. The shark is now joined by swimmers from other survivor games and eager to attack the raft. No man can tame a shark and there‚Äôs nowhere to escape, so prepare for shooting and swinging all night and day long!

üî®Build and upgrade

Pay attention to the condition of your raft on the water in survival games in the ocean. It‚Äôs not enough to tie together a couple of wooden planks without a roof or even walls to feel safe. Be creative and expand the raft free in height and width, because the only limit for building in survival simulator games 2018 is your imagination. There‚Äôs also a lot of upgrades for fishing, storage space extension, that you can improve the floating shelter with to help you survive in the ocean.

üõ∂Explore the ocean

Ever wondered if there‚Äôs lost land with forest woods, jungle and animal pets in this ocean without end? An awesome feature of our island survival games free is now implemented in this one. Don‚Äôt sit idle ‚Äî dare to explore the ocean and islands around. What do they hide: horror or glory, medieval royale treasures or wild tigers and scary dinosaurs from the jurassic age or even an old airplane wreckage? What's more you can find resources, upgrades for the raft and other items on the islands. You won‚Äôt need a ship or an ark to sail to them in shark games ‚Äî a simple boat will do, and may the stars be your guide.

üåãLearn the story of the apocalypse

An unknown devastating cataclysm turned the world into an endless ocean and last survivors are locked on scattered islands like in prison, dreaming of finding their home. The quest of our raft game is to find them and discover the truth of what happened, find other people who could survive and join them.

ü¶àSurvive on a raft

The latest release of our offline survival simulator games is full of evolved enemies, new items and other features that will surprise everybody. Download Ocean Nomad game and embark on an epic survival adventure. Play with no wifi or internet connection, last as many days as you can and share the results online with friends! 

*Attention:* We are not affiliated with the developers of the original Raft game.
Our company Unisoft Games has full rights to use the RAFT trademark in the USA (The Mark Consists of Standard Characters without claim to any particular font style, size or color - Ser. No. 87-605,582 FILED 09-12-2017)

developerAddress: Unit 4203, 30 Bloomsbury Street, Ground Floor, London, England, WC1B 3QJ
recentChanges:
Fixed map loading
Fixed minor bugs
comments: Great game play! Only problem I've come across while playing is the missions arent wanting to accept when completed like if opened the bunker twice, and second time I finally got a new quest for a key card but now it's not letting me move forward in the story after building the radio thing to supposedly look for the lost key card. Other than that it's a great game but I think it might still have a few kinks in it. I also have a few other questions concerning the game play.

It can be fun but for some reason, the quests do not always work. I.e. collect 20 wood resources by water or island, but it won't work. You'll collect double and it will still say 16/20 collected. Even viewing a video ad to add progress does absolutely nothing. Just wastes time. It is not possible to achieve all of the quests. Please fix.

The sky and lighting effects are phenomenal and the building can be tedious but it is straightforward. I'm also in level 32 limbo, and many parts of the islands are not functioning. The Flower is a lie! There is also no way to buy items as all transactions are declined. That is what puzzles me the most. My dream raft is built, saved, and waiting for the update that will open the rest of the game. Godspeed, devs.

Love the game. Hate the bugs. I keep hitting glitches when I travel. The first time I went to a different raft it said I broke the door but couldn't get through. I restarted the game from the beginning, now I can't get to a different island. Would love to play further if I could, I really like the game.... If you're having issues adjusting the screen side to side, just adjust the sensitivity to 100% and it's way easier.

I had just got this game a couple of days ago. I am really enjoying it. I am having a problem though. When I tried to travel to the first island, it took about a day and a half (irl) to do so. Now I'm having trouble getting back to my raft. Am I doing something wrong... I've searched the island, gathered what I could. Clicked on my raft... nothing. Some insight or advice would be very helpful. Again, I am enjoying this game and I don't want something so small to ruin my thoughts of it. Thanks.

title: Ocean Is Home: Survival Island
description:
Try to live the life of a man who has got on a desert island ...
You'll have to look for food, build a house, collecting and crafting things necessary for life. Your only goal - to survive!
-------------
Ocean Is Home is:
- Full freedom, explore the huge island ;
- Build your own house;
- Craft items and weapons to hunt and survive on the island;
- Advanced system of player skills;
- Different kinds of transport.
-----------------------------
Quick tips:
- Mine wood and stone at the beginning;
- Use it to craft items for the construction of houses, weapons for hunting animals, tools for fishing, water extraction, electricity and many other things;
- Find some food or build your own farm.
---------------
- We are in the social networks:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OceanIsHome
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oceanishome
Twitter: https://twitter.com/birdydogstudio
--------------
You can always write on e-mail of our studio about your problem and we will certainly consider your application.
Mail for communication: oceanishomeofficial@gmail.com

recentChanges:
Added new weapons
Added shotgun mechanic
Fixed weapons physics
Bow replaced by crossbow
Fixed arrow physics
Performance optimization
Fixed game balance
Bugfix
comments: Love this game however the update took some key things away. The watch videos for coins was very helpful...maybe bring that back. :D I do like the zombies being at every area, makes it more of a challenge. But the inventory or loot seems lower at these locations. Makes fighting the zombies not worth the waste in ammo when loot is small. Still love the game and will play forever!

I love this game, I love to build and all the things you guys have in here to build a house and make it feel like a home is great, the only things I don't see is livingroom furniture everything else is there. As to filling up water bottles I don't have a problem with. The thing that I find weird is that my truck disappeared, otherwise this is my go to destresser keep up good work and looking forward to updates....

I love the game but keep getting an invisible barrier everytime I try to go to the other island. Even if I have enough fuel in the boat, or if I try to swim there are. Very annoying. Now it seems like I'm done with exploring because I'm stuck on one Island and there's nothing else to do and no new resources to move ahead. Im lv 16 btw.

I love the game however I feel like it is a bit boring. I feel like adding in natural disasters such as volcanic eruptions, tornadoes, earthquakes, hurricanes etc would make it much more realistic and much more fun to play. It would make it feel like an actuall surivival game. At this point all i really have to do is make sure i dont starve to death, die of thirst or get eaten by a wild animal and when you've had the game for as long as I have that gets very tedious.

Animals can bite us even their head is not towards us..... Animals head can cross the wooden wall and they can bite us.... The wooden stairs are not as shown in the crafts gallery... Grass can come up out of the wooden foundation....... Zombies should be removed and our friendlies should be added which could be with us to help each other.....

title: Ocean Survival
description:
The ship sank into the sea after hitting a storm and you are the only survivor awakened in a lifeboat. Keep an eye on life stats such as hunger and thirst, collect valuable resources for crafting, create weapons for hunt and use whatever you have at hand. Expand your boat to build larger shelter and defeat sea intruders to your boat day and night. After all people can do anything to survive!

Game Features:
- Build your shelter from the ground up
- Utilize an extensive crafting system with tons of recipes
- Explore a massive living and breathing ocean landscape as you find the means to survive

summary: Survive in a lifeboat drifting in the ocean as long as possible!
developerAddress: Flat/RM603  06/F, Laws Commercial Plaza 788 Cheung Sha Wan Road, KL
comments: If your looking for a good decent survival game for mobile than this is definitely it! I'm currently having a blast with this game however the reason i can't give it five stars is because the amount of ads in the game is disgusting. You seriously get a pop up ad at the start of every day in game which isn't cool but if that was toned down I'd give it five stars.

It wasn't bad. It it could definitely use improvement, I was really displeased with how often you became thirsty and hungry in survival- it often gets pretty annoying how often I would miss loot or plenty if other things because I had to constantly produce water and fish basically just to keep up with the food and water needs

Amazing game, good graphics, great for passing time. Recommend downloading. This is the best game i have found yet! The only problem is that i cant move objects i have placed already on a floor above or below the one it was origionally on, is there a way to do this? Also, how do i get to the islands?

The game is very nice but after you create an update please fix some problems like ive been sunk into the water then i die when i respawn im in underwater again,another problem is the jumping problem sometimes when you are in a water the jump button wont work pls fix all of that and ill give this game a 5 stars!.And also add some creative mode.

It's pretty good. I just wish there was more to the building. Like torches for example. More furniture. Variety in enemies, weather, more food options. It's a good start but feels a bit lacking after awhile since you run out of things to do and work towards.

title: MarcoPolo Ocean
description:
Parents' Choice Gold Award! 
Make dolphins jump. Build a coral reef. Explore the deep sea. Create your own aquarium. These are just some of the fun things you can do with MarcoPolo Ocean, a ‚Äúdigital sandbox‚Äù for kids to play in that sparks their interest in the most unexplored part of our planet ‚Äì the ocean.

Build and Explore
Six build-and-play activities bring the language and the images of the ocean to life. Ocean is playfully narrated and animated to reinforce vocabulary, physical attributes and ocean concepts.

*Coral Reef
*Octopuses
*Marine Mammals
*Fish
*Boat
*Submersible

Free Play Exploration
The open ocean is a personal aquarium your child can explore however he or she chooses!

*Explore from the shoreline all the way down to the sea floor
*Steer your submersible and boat through ocean waters
*Add marine animals and fish to the ocean and interact with more than 30 different species
*Investigate by tapping, dragging and swiping where the animals live in the ocean to see their natural behaviors and how they interact with other animals

Through self-directed discovery, we expose kids to early skills in science, technology, engineering and math (STEM), focusing on the following concepts:

*The wide variety of animal species that live in the shallow and deep parts of the ocean
*Ocean landscape
*Construction and characteristics of a boat (shipping vessel) and submersible
*Characteristics of fish and marine mammals
*Topic-specific vocabulary exposure and acquisition

Privacy Policy
We take privacy very seriously. We do not collect or share personal information about you or your child, nor do we allow any third-party advertising. You can see our full policy at http://www.gomarcopolo.com/privacy-policy/

About Us: http://gomarcopolo.com/us/

comments: I love it! But can you pls fix the random crashes QwQ

Cannot seem to purchase any apps from this company. I keep getting a generic "something went wrong" message when I try to pay, and there is no paid app available on Google Play. Any brief enjoyment my child received from this app went up in smoke when we realized I could not fulfill my promise to unlock the rest of it for them. Same problem with their "Arctic" app. Seems like a lot of people are having problems like this.
Just downloaded this twice and each time as the previous commenter stated, the app crashes after the logo. Kindle fire HD 10 2017 64GB would have rated five stars except for this issue.
My son loves this game, but it won't let me download the other packs! Please fix this
My little brother absolutely loves this game. Many people with kids 5 and under should get this game.

title: Splash: Ocean Sanctuary
description:
Welcome to Splash - one of the most relaxing fish games out there! Feed and grow fish as you grow your ocean reef, and raise hundreds of species - far more than other fish games!

Raise hundreds of different species of fish, decorate your reef with beautiful corals and repopulate the ocean with exotic wildlife. Document your fish in the Aquapedia, play fish games, and learn exciting real-life facts about your fish, your coral and your reef! Watch in wonder as your reef comes to life, teeming with all sorts of different fish in a relaxing ocean reef environment. Create the most stunning reef in all of fishdom!

So come and play one of the best feed and grow fish games out there! Splash is overflowing with eye-catching species, stunning ocean reef environments and relaxing gameplay that is sure to keep you entertained for hours - this is no aquarium!

KEY FEATURES:
- Build and nurture your own beautiful reef, adorned with stunning real life corals. One of the best fish games out there!
- Feed and grow fish species including Angelfish, Clownfish, cute Seahorses and Jellyfish - this is no aquarium!
- Relax with your new ocean friends, guiding them through the reef and observing their unique personalities and behaviours.
- Catalogue your discoveries and learn more about your fish in the Aquapedia, full of facts about the marine life you discover.
- Connect with friends to exchange gifts and help each other in your fish games.
- Become an ocean photographer and take snaps of your favorite fish. Customise the images and share your creations with your friends!
- Feed and grow fish, then release your fish into the wild to repopulate the ocean with exotic life.
- Participate in special events to collect unique fish only available for a limited time.
- Level up to unlock more fish, decorations, and space for your reef sanctuary.

#splashgame

Please note the ‚Äúsplashcam‚Äù feature requires read/write external storage permissions, in order to save in game screenshots taken by players to their devices.

recentChanges: We're getting ready for some festivities in the Reef! What new friends will we find to help us spread some good cheer?
comments: Found this game and absolutely love it. However, videos seem to glitch out. Had an iPhone to begin with and was getting videos to watch for splashcash etc. After a time I wasn't able to watch any videos anywhere to boost my gameplay. When I explained to the developers what was happening I was told the problem was my phone. I went out and brought a brand new Samsung A20 in November 2019. As of last week I haven't been able to receive any videos to watch yet again. Highly disappointed with this!

I am really sorry to rate this game now 2 stars. its been giving me problems since I downloaded it. keeps on telling me to reload sanctuary and now to top it off I can't connect to either my facebook or twitter to get more friends. it bombs out and then I am back at my sactuary. please guys fix this so I can get my friend to play along then only I will give it a 5 star. thank you

Why is it that now im.on level 31 and now I cant get my rewards or play videos to earn things... it's very frustrating and I love this game but if I'm not able to get my stuff I'm gonna uninstall it.. dont want to but I will if we keep getting glitches non stop

I give this game five stars simply because there aren't any annoying pop up ads. You can actually still choose to watch ads for rewards. Thank you thank you thank you. A lot of good games are ruined but pop up ads. Also the game it self is really fun.

Beautiful and engaging.... At first. It's a shame that the game is designed to allow less and less interaction. On the positive, at least it prevents you from wanting to spend $ on it. Fun lasts a little less than a week

title: Ocean Dream
description:
Dive into the blue ocean, relax, and enjoy watching the scenery!
Use swipe gestures to change your viewpoint and to look around.
The auto camera focuses on points of interest, allowing for your complete relaxation.
Tap a creature and you will get information about it.

Unlock the Full Version to disable ads and add more creatures.

Please note that Ocean Dream is free to play and thus ad-financed.

comments: I would like you to add being able to go to different places in this app. Also, when you do it, add giant squid, angler fish, and other deep sea creatures, and make them only in places where you can't see the surface at all to make it more realistic. I also really want you to make a pherstoric version of this app and include megalodon, lipuradon sea monster, and pleisasurous sea monster. Make full version unlock sarcosucas crocodile and predator X sea monster. Name the app Pherstoric Ocean Dream

Hi! I love the ocean and want to be an oceanographer soon. I would love it if you added other places in the ocean such as coral reefs. You could also add turtles and mythical creatures. If you do or don't, I love your app and it is great for relaxation. Thank you for your time.
I like the sounds but you only see like 4 kinds of fish.I would like if the screen is in a reef or at least show more fish,sharks and mammals.If this is in the app I would like the app.
don't install it's cool but boring and u can't move any where I give it one star for how real the animals look
Please dont add premium versionsüòî

title: Relax Ocean - Nature sounds: sleep & meditation
description:
Relax with the best sounds of the sea. Fall asleep faster and sleep better!

Ideal for relaxing, sleeping, meditation, concentration, or if you have problems with tinnitus (ear ringing).

The app plays different sounds of the sea, the sounds played in this way are also known as white noise.
White noise has beneficial effects on the body and mind because, covering the noise of the external environment, promotes relaxation and concentration.

You can set the timer and put your app in background or turn off the screen. At the end of the time, the sound fades gently and the application closes by itself. So you do not have to worry about closing the app if you fall asleep.

Do you have trouble going to sleep? This app helps you sleep by blocking distractions. Now you can asleep faster and sleep better!
You can say goodbye to your insomnia! Improve your life!

Use it after a stressful day to regain your inner peace. Go into your oasis of calm.


*** Application features ***

- 10+ perfectly looped sounds
- timer system that slowly fades audio out
- auto-pause sounds on incoming call
- volume controls
- quick menu
- usage in the background and with other apps
- no streaming is required for playback (no data connection required)
- pause and play sounds


*** List of sounds ***

- Calm sea at sunset
- Seabed
- Mediterranean coast
- Dolphins
- Ocean waves and seagulls
- Walking on the shoreline
- Coral reef
- Tropical sea
- Seaside bungalow
- Music and ocean waves


*** Usage notes ***

For a better experience, I recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.
You can use the app in background and with other apps.


*** Notes on permissions ***

- Device ID & call information (read phone status and identity)
Used to stop sound on incoming call and to play again at the end of call.

- In-app purchases
Used in the purchase of the premium version.

- Prevent phone from sleeping
Used to keep alive the app when you turn off the screen or while using other apps.

- Full network access and view network connections
Used to verify the purchases and show ads.

- timer system that slowly fades audio out
- auto-pause sounds on incoming call
- volume controls
- quick menu
- usage in the background and with other apps
- no streaming is required for playback (no data connection required)
- pause and play sounds


*** List of sounds ***

- Calm sea at sunset
- Seabed
- Mediterranean coast
- Dolphins
- Ocean waves and seagulls
- Walking on the shoreline
- Coral reef
- Tropical sea
- Seaside bungalow
- Music and ocean waves


*** Usage notes ***

For a better experience, I recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.
You can use the app in background and with other apps.


*** Notes on permissions ***

- Device ID & call information (read phone status and identity)
Used to stop sound on incoming call and to play again at the end of call.

- In-app purchases
Used in the purchase of the premium version.

- Prevent phone from sleeping
Used to keep alive the app when you turn off the screen or while using other apps.

- Full network access and view network connections
Used to verify the purchases and show ads.
summary: Relax with the best sounds of the ocean mixable with music.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Love this app for my stress and anxiety it has perfect sound and has options on where to go for other sounds like it. I cant use normal mediation music as it just doesnt carm me down but waterfalls and dolphins do so its just perfect combine this app with a vr simulator of swimming apps and you have a perfect combo for relaxing. Down side: yes it does have disrupting adds but they are only on the premium feature iteams when using the free app virsion.

I love this app. Finally an app that says "free" is actually FREE. I have been trying to get a good night sleep for so long and usually ended up keeping my TV on, but then a commercial would be loud and wake me up. I have now had 2 great nights of actually sleeping. For me, that is remarkable
I love listening to calm sea @ sunset üòä I couldn't sleep last night, and the sound helped me drift back to sleep. Thank you mikdroid for creating this app!
Screen sounds make you feel as if you were there. The music relaxes you. You can play both at the same time.
Nice app. Could use a little more water sound in some of the selections

title: Ocean HD Free
description:
Download this free version to see why 'Ocean HD' live wallpaper has made such a big splash, and support us if you wish by unlocking the base version and any optional add-ons that suit your fancy. For a limited time only, get all the features in Ocean HD for half price - the Base Pack is now 50% off!

Dive down and immerse yourself in your own underwater world every time you use your device!

Explore the pristine waters of a deep ocean environment teeming with exotic sea life.  Discover a sunken ship, coral reef, and more as sunlight glints off hidden treasure.  Schools of fish swim past you while a manta ray glides overhead.  Or, dive into shallow seas and drift in azure blue waters - it's all up to you.  Watch closely and you may even see a shark in the distance!

Interact with the fish that swim nearby and the hidden treasure.  Customize your dive experience with hundreds of combinations - hide the ship, change the treasure to a diving helmet, choose from 'Shallow Seas' or 'Coral Life' themes, and much more!

Optional add-on packs are also available for purchase, allowing you to choose the features most meaningful to you. The 'Shark Pack' features Great White, Tiger, and Hammerhead sharks, new themes, and a shark cage and diver.  The 'Friendly Seas Pack' includes a Dolphin, Sea Turtle, interactive Seahorses, new themes and more!

This visually stunning live wallpaper is true 3D with hand-crafted artwork. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life and works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers.

This is still the most impressive and least memory/battery hungry ocean WP to date. Even thu last update is yrs ago. Have run on all my Huawei smart phones and tabs for the last 3 yrs with no issue. Purchased all the add-ons.. Well worth it

title: Ocean Rift
description:
Ocean Rift is the world‚Äôs first VR aquatic safari park. Explore a vivid underwater world full of life including dolphins, sharks, turtles, sea snakes, rays, manatees, sea lions, orcas, humpback whales, and even dinosaurs! 

Swim around, explore and interact with sea creatures across twelve unique habitats ranging from coral reefs and shipwrecks to lagoons, the Arctic and Atlantis. 

Ocean Rift features state of the art procedural animation. All star animals have their own artificial intelligence, which means that every visit to Ocean Rift will be a unique experience.

IMPORTANT NOTES: 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉA Daydream compatible phone and Daydream compatible VR headset is required to play.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉHeadphones recommended.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉThe sharks and dinosaurs have not been fed recently.

comments: Pros: Nice undersea CGI world. Free for the full version with all the creatures. Cons: Flickers on an S9+, which doesn't happen in the Samsung VR version, but they want money (not unreasonably) for access to all the creatures in the Samsung version. No collision detection for moving creatures and plants - you just go through them causing parts of the creatures to disappear.

Developers I think there is a glitch in your app when using on google Daydream with the Samsung S8, the frame rates are giving a strobing effect which is very uncomfortable viewing over 30 seconds, I would of given this 5 stars but as it stands the strobing effect of the lights in the water just gives me an instant headache. Would you please look into this then I will write an updated review when this glitch is sorted.
One of the best free app for Daydream. You can buy additional sea creatures, which seems fair even for free user, because free content is also very high quality
This is definitely in my top five Daydream apps. This is what I will show people to demonstrate how cool VR is from now on.
The app has potential to be relaxing but on my samsung S8 galaxy with google daydream it has a strobbing effect, which gives me headaches If this can be rectified i will update my review

title: Ocean Survivor - Island Is Home
descriptionHTML:
Try to live the life of a man who got stranded on Ocean Island. Island is home now! Enjoy this Ocean Survivor ‚Äì Survival building home game.

Here, in this Ocean Survivor ‚Äì Island Survival game, you will have to look for food, build a shelter, collect raw items, craft necessary things for life. Your only goal is to survive on island home building game.

Ocean Survivor is about:
- Full freedom, explore the vast island;
- Build your own shelter;
- Craft items and weapons to hunt and survive on the island;
- Advanced system of player skills;
- Different kinds of hunting, surviving and crafting

Surviving tips:
- collect wood and stone at the beginning;
- craft usual items from wood and stone
- Use it to craft items for the construction of shelter, weapons for hunting animals, tools for survival on island, water extraction, light and many other things;
- Find some food/water, save extra food
- Different kinds of hunting, surviving and crafting

Island survival is not an easy as it seems! Looking for food, building shelter from craft-able items. Gather food, craft weapons, hunt animals and survive in ocean. This best survival simulator includes modern crafting system, huge number of raw resources for survival, variety of wild animals and weapons. New survival game and craft game is waiting for you! Don‚Äôt make it your last day on earth!

Ocean Survivor ‚Äì survival building home game is a story of a survival hero who got in the middle of ocean on huge island full of wild animals and resources. You are empty handed, craft weapons and hunt wild beasts. As you taming and hunting animals, you will get more items that will help you survive from the lost island. Show your surviving game skills and hunting skills with third person shooting in hunting and escape life safeguard missions.

Ocean Island is absolutely dangerous, full of wild animals ‚Äì your only friends here are natural resource. Some ancient people may also live here, because you can see some mysterious deserted houses. You are all alone on island. There‚Äôs no guarantee you can survive on this island, but you can try. Enjoy Survival island free addictive game of wild life.

Ocean Survivor FREE game features:

‚Ä¢ Crafting;
‚Ä¢ Shelter Building;
‚Ä¢ Ocean Survival;
‚Ä¢ Wilderness survival simulator 3D;
‚Ä¢ Wild animals hunting - you can hunt a bear, a boar, a rabbit..;
‚Ä¢ Real beautiful nature;
‚Ä¢ Real island adventure; -
‚Ä¢ A lot of activities to do - craft weapon;
‚Ä¢ Cool graphics and easy navigation.

Survive on an island like a real survival hero! Survival island adventure begins with hard time survival with raw resources. Craft wood axe, pick axe, knife and gun in this Ocean Survivor ‚Äì Survival building home game. Seek help from your axe for your survival day mission on ocean island. Fight or hunt the savage animals combat the wild life to save your life in this survival simulator game. Third person survival game, only TPS survival game on playstore, to evolve as a survivor warrior in this thrilling adventure game. Master your survivor on island skills and hunt wolf, bear and other rival animals. Craft and use all the possible tools and weapons to defend and survive on island.

Use all your surviving and hunting skills to survive in island! Use wood axe to cut trees, pick axe to break stones and weapons to hunt animals for food and their raw-hide. You will have to eat apples, drink coconut water and cut trees for woods to light a fire to keep wild animals away at night. Use your weapon to hunt animals to get food of their meat. Defend yourself from wild animals and zombies of ocean island. Ocean Survivor ‚Äì Survival home building is a new adventure simulator of jungle world survival in the middle of ocean. Let‚Äôs start hunting and survival journey! Plan the mission to survive on the ocean island and then return back to home.

The best free survival simulator is here! There are wild animals, mysterious caves, hunting and taming, building, crafting and other things in the game!

title: Ultimate Ocean Predator 2016
description:
Here is your chance for an underwater adventure!

Take control of a pliosaurus! This guy is an old sea dweller, but he‚Äôs back for more! In this action-packed adventure simulation, play as an ancient ocean predator scouring the deep blue for some prey. Even the jurassic age hasn‚Äôt seen anything like this! Show the swimmers, divers, and casual passersby on boats whose territory it is; they‚Äôre in for a bloody surprise! Battle your neighbors who dare to violate your space--sharks and whales. Complete different missions and earn coins to explore more advanced features.The large expanse of the ocean and beach is yours. 

Ultimate Ocean Predator 2016 Features:

‚Ä¢Animated Great Pliosaurus

title: Survival on raft: Crafting in the Ocean
description:
¬´Hey, survivor! Watch out, shark is here!¬ª

A terrible plane crash took the lives of all the passengers and crew... except for one. You a survivor and now you are out of civilization. Around the ocean, hot sun and hungry shark. An almost hopeless situation and a huge opportunity to die throw adrenaline into your blood. You have only one thing ‚Äî craft for survive.

Survival simulator on the raft will throw you into an epic adventure in the middle of the ocean! Mankind and civilization far, beyond the boundless horizon. The main goal of the game is to hold out as long as possible alive, and for this you need to make crafting and building ‚Äî gather resources, improve the raft and build a shelter right on the raft. Do not forget that thirst and hunger are not the only danger. Make sure that the shark attack does not destroy your plans for survival!

ü¶à Survival Simulator
Watch for indicators of health, hunger and thirst. Otherwise your adventure on the raft will quickly end!

üìú Explore the recipe for crafting!
Catch fish, grow vegetables and get water ‚Äî do everything to survive! Create building materials, clothes, weapons, chests and other things necessary for survival.

üí° Extract resources!
Use the hook to catch the necessary resources: debris, algae, boxes and others. They will be useful to you for survival!

üî® Build and improve!
Spread, equip and protect the raft. Build a real shelter that will allow you to last as long as possible!

If you like games in the survival genre and crafting games, then our game will surely appeal to you!

Write your feedback to our groups ‚Äî we will try to disassemble all appeals and take into account your comments in further updates!

Our contacts:
VK: https://vk.com/io__games
Discord: https://discord.gg/JFde2t8
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/groups/IOGamesDevelopment/

comments: It's really a good game until you want to build your second floor. Am I really only allowed to place 1 floor on the top of the pillar I've built? If so, how can I put things on my first floor if it's only covered by pillars to support my floors on the upper floor? Or am I doing something wrong? If so, someone please correct me and teach me how to build the 2nd floor without taking all the spaces on the first floor by the pillars.

This is one of the best mobile games out there! I have always loved this game but this update was superb! This is like a console game to me! I love the intro! All the detail on this game is amazing! The waves change in intensity and the raft rocks on the waves! The lighting is awesome! The weather affects are so cool! Fog, rain, thunderstormes and the clouds change shape and move! Love how you interact with objects so realistic! Great job developers! I love this game!

The game is good but I completed it in one day, it would be really mad if there was more to the game like you found other survivors and then they become part of your crew you could get them to do things too But over all game is pretty good It would be nice if there was other animals like more sea life and birds in the sky

This is a good game and fairly easy to play. I really like the new update as I was running out of things I could do without some kind of storage. I just wished it was worth building a dwelling as the rain just goes straight through. There are now beds and tables and they moved the coconut (you can still grow them) use to a higher lvl hich is a pain. Still don't know how to use furnace though üòÅ a few bugs I hope they can sort out next time. Have a signal gun!

This is pretty good, even if it is a copycat game. It's easy to learn, mostly very intuitive. The graphics are good for mobile, animations are nice. The leveling curve is even: not difficult, but not a game you can leave idle either. Most of the negative reviews are left by kids complaining that the game is too hard or scary, or people who want to play a survival game that isn't challenging (if that sounds like you, then maybe survival games aren't for you).

title: Odyssey of the Ocean
description:
Odyssey of the Ocean is a 3D-maritime adventure game based on a realistic, geographic system. In this game, the player will take on the role of a high-seas commander. Adventurers from different countries and regions will chart new courses to open up new naval routes, while also engaging in battle.
‚ÄªBackground Story:
 In AD 800, Kievan Rus‚Äôcontrolled the Black Sea and the Baltic Sea, the Abbasid Caliphate controlled the Red Sea and the Persian Gulf and, thus, the Ottoman Empire controlled the vast majority of the Mediterranean. However, this wasn‚Äôt enough. We always want what we do not have; humans, by their very nature, are always seeking to expand their boundaries. People began to wonder, for instance, what is hidden beneath the waves: buried treasure or killer sea monsters? Everyone had been hearing that the earth was round, but there wasn‚Äôt any proof. Magellan went on a voyage across the world and changed that forever. You can change the world too. Commander, lead your troops onto the high seas. Dock in foreign ports, and plant your flag in distant lands!
‚ÄªGame Characteristics:
‚óÜThe Guild battle has begun. Who will emerge victorious?
Three main forces have gathered on the open seas: the Abbasid Caliphate and their brilliant civilization, Kievan Rus‚Äô, descendants of the Vikings and the powerful Ottoman Empire. The trumpets of war have sounded, and the armies are fast approaching. Who will conquer the oceans? Commander, it is time for you to show what you‚Äôve got!
‚óÜReal time, naval PVP battles, slaughter your enemies and become king!
Plunder passing ships, gather allies to defeat the World BOSS, participate in Arena challenges, large-scale, multiplayer PVP battles, tons of combat modes to choose from, who could ask for anything more? Commander, time waits for no man. Let‚Äôs get started!
‚óÜHidden treasure is waiting for you! Go acquire some new wealth!
We have hidden more than 100 buried treasures in the sea. These are gifts from Sea God. Maybe you‚Äôll find Gold or Silver; maybe you‚Äôll find a new warship‚Ä¶.or maybe you‚Äôll encounter a killer sea monster! It all depends on your luck!
‚óÜGorgeous skill effects, a smooth combat experience
We have developed a unique skill set for each captain. They can advance on an enemy and attack, or fall back into a defensive position. Recruit legendary sea captains like Babarosa Hayreddin the ‚ÄúRedbeard‚Äù and Edward Thatch, the "Blackbeard" and fly into battle!
‚óÜExquisite combat vessels, equipment set bonuses
We‚Äôve designed 24 types of warships and 14 equipment sets. Let‚Äôs say you own the ‚ÄúFlying Dutchman‚Äù and then obtain protection from ‚ÄúPoseidon, the Sea God‚Äù. Well, you‚Äôll have enough power to crush your enemies.
‚óÜJoin guilds, because there‚Äôs strength in numbers!
You‚Äôll find players from many different countries and regions. Join up with them and form guilds to pool your resources. Guilds will provide you with superior protection as well.
‚óÜA unique home construction system will allow you to create your own safe haven.
Customize your home with tons of different options. Commander, develop your home to serve as a testament to your brilliance.
‚óÜLight up the 12 constellations to guide you on your quest.
For centuries, seafarers have relied on the stars to guide them. Go to the Observatory to watch the stars. The illuminated constellations will show you the way forward, so you never get lost.
‚óÜA precise commerce system; it‚Äôs fun to trade!
We‚Äôve set up 143 ports across the 7 seas and 4 great oceans. Each port has its own unique products, and there will be special sales and events at certain fixed intervals. Join in events to build your stash of goods!
‚óÜTons of events make your adventure even more exciting!
There are always surprises in store on the high seas. Watch out for pirates or sudden changes in weather. Perhaps a plague will descend on your crew and start killing them off. We have pulled out all the stops to make this a realistic ocean adventure!

‚óÜGorgeous skill effects, a smooth combat experience
We have developed a unique skill set for each captain. They can advance on an enemy and attack, or fall back into a defensive position. Recruit legendary sea captains like Babarosa Hayreddin the ‚ÄúRedbeard‚Äù and Edward Thatch, the "Blackbeard" and fly into battle!
‚óÜExquisite combat vessels, equipment set bonuses
We‚Äôve designed 24 types of warships and 14 equipment sets. Let‚Äôs say you own the ‚ÄúFlying Dutchman‚Äù and then obtain protection from ‚ÄúPoseidon, the Sea God‚Äù. Well, you‚Äôll have enough power to crush your enemies.
‚óÜJoin guilds, because there‚Äôs strength in numbers!
You‚Äôll find players from many different countries and regions. Join up with them and form guilds to pool your resources. Guilds will provide you with superior protection as well.
‚óÜA unique home construction system will allow you to create your own safe haven.
Customize your home with tons of different options. Commander, develop your home to serve as a testament to your brilliance.
‚óÜLight up the 12 constellations to guide you on your quest.
For centuries, seafarers have relied on the stars to guide them. Go to the Observatory to watch the stars. The illuminated constellations will show you the way forward, so you never get lost.
‚óÜA precise commerce system; it‚Äôs fun to trade!
We‚Äôve set up 143 ports across the 7 seas and 4 great oceans. Each port has its own unique products, and there will be special sales and events at certain fixed intervals. Join in events to build your stash of goods!
‚óÜTons of events make your adventure even more exciting!
There are always surprises in store on the high seas. Watch out for pirates or sudden changes in weather. Perhaps a plague will descend on your crew and start killing them off. We have pulled out all the stops to make this a realistic ocean adventure!
summary: Venture forth on the high seas and write your own legend!

comments: Great game so far. Fun and interesting battles. Lots to do but at your own pace. My only negative comment is that the server connection constantly lags out whenever you do anything. Maybe you can get a hosted server for North America so we can have a smoother gameplay experience?

So ive been playing for a week now. I like the game. I really do. Heres why im giving it 1 star for now. Theres so much in the game that has zero explanation. The merchant ships i send out collect millions in profit yet i never see a penny of it. Hot items at any harbor NEVER list a harbor youve been to . Every single item, and theres thousands, will all say unknown harbor. But it tell you to inquire in the pub yet doesnt tell you how. Everything you do in pub changing nothing. Very frustrating.

uninstalled, started on server 5, bought the first recharge pack, after a few days server was laggy and unplayable in uk made a bug report that was never aknowledged, changed server to server 3 and after a game crash lost my new level 15 character with another starter pack... lost money twice, stay away from that game

Can only give 4 stars at the moment as thereWas a few problems when first downloaded but it's a new game and a lot have been fixed now and the game is quite good still some things to sort like match ups I'm a low level player yet get matched up against a mega player in arena hopefully they will sort out to help new players .

A wonderful remake of an ancient browser game hereby becoming a 2,5D exploratory adventure almost with same 2,5D from Diablo Expansion. Exploration kings of small navy ships are fascinated by the periodical fights-trades-navigation-exploration-research, build, advancement, development, investment they make every next minute. All along with a shinny musical background. Nice game. Can get even better to full 3D for players with good phones and more dedication to the game.

title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2
description:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. 

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!

title: Ocean Fortune
description:
Fishing is at the core of Battle of Fishing, an all-new development to classic fishing, a highly restored video game of fishing with cannons. Fish and get Fishing Coins, and free Diamonds to upgrade cannons. All this within an all-new fantasy seabed setting. Return to this pure fishing game and enjoy new 3D shells and new fish!
Rich environments, the Golden Dragon King, the Ancient Ice Dragon, and the Mythological Phoenix are all waiting for you!
Tons of items for free draws! Loads of free item gifts! Challenge real people, and enjoy the excitement of being online with so many people! Form guilds and join your brethren to defeat the Dragon King!

title: Dream Blue Ocean
description:
Ride on your cool boat and travel the great blue ocean while enjoying fishing and diving!
A beautiful blue ocean is waiting for you!
 
- Idle healing game with simple and easy touch control.
- Go fishing on the beautiful settings of the Five Oceans and collect various marine life forms.
- Check out even more awesome underwater life forms through deep-sea diving.
- Play with various Fishermen with unique abilities and characteristics.
- Customize your Free Diver with various costumes and accessories.
- Have fun playing the Slide Puzzle mini-game, and get involved in various events such as Cleaning the Ocean.
- Achievement & leaderboard supported.
- It's an offline game that does not require an internet connection.
- The game supports English.

title: Ocean Escape : Endless Escape
description:
Tap to swim up! Be careful not to hit the spikes. 

The objective is to help the little squid escape the deadly ocean. The squid in the game swims horizontally, tap at the right time to help it swim pass the spikes through the gap.

How far can you escape in this dangerous ocean? Many mind-twisting and challenging obstacles awaits as you progress further in this scary underwater adventure. 

Besides that, what makes this squid game special is its squid hunting feature. Player will have the chance to hunt for their own unique squid as they progress in the game. There are over 40 different squids to catch and unlock and if you are a person who loves collecting many different characters in a game, this game is for you

Besides squid hunting, there are also premium squids with its own unique trail effects that the player can purchase from the squid store. 

=======Features======

- Daily Squid Hunt : Catch your favorite squid!

- Different squid designs : Unlock more than 40+ unique and cute squid skins!

- Cool, unique trail effects : Purchase premium squid from the Squid Store

- 2 Modes : Easy and Fast!

- Triple Dash : Make combos to score higher faster!

- Catchy, upbeat background music

========================

All in all, Ocean Escape is a one tap arcade game perfect for casual plays. Saving sea animals as you escape the endless odyssey, it is one of the free squid games that is easy to learn, but difficult to master. If you are a person who loves ocean animal games, this is game is definitely for us as you get to catch your own unique squid!

--- Finalist of SEA Games Award 2018 ---

comments: I am a long-time fan of Ocean. The app has the feature to listen to books, which is very cool for taking walks. The one complaint I have for this is that it loads very slowly on startup and doesn't move smoothly and efficiently from one screen to the next. The interface (UI) took me a little bit to decipher as well. It should be easier to return to the spot where you stopped reading or listening. Not that it's hard now. Just a little hiccupy.

What's going on? I've used ocean for years. Now I've downloaded it onto my Moto E5, and I can't open it. I get a sign-in screen (I've never signed into ocean before) that doesn't let me do anything. It's beyond frustrating when a well-loved app no longer works. Can can you help?
Maybe i'm just having a challenge with the changes, but the old Ocean seemed easier to use.
A very useful and feature-rich application.

I love this idea, but this app will not load on this tablet. Keeps saying it had a loading error. This device is a Samsung Galaxy Pro note. On another device, a samsung Galaxy Tab A, it will not download some titles like the Dawn-breakers. The app is also a little slow in coming up and the opportunity to download does not stay up long or does not come up at all on smaller books.

title: Ocean War
description:
Ocean war is a very interesting casual online game, Here we are presenting the special visual effects with a variety of fish on the mysterious seabed. The game is also super easy to get on with! Use your the turret to kill all kinds of fish to get more golds! Forge your turret and make them more powerful! Get ready to challenge the ultimate BOSS with your friends!

Highlights:

(1) This is a Free game and super easy to get on with! You can experience the magical sea world in only 10 seconds!
(2) More than 50 mysterious marine creatures are waiting for you to explore.
(3) Enjoy the generous rewards! Here we are present you the unlimited free golds and diamonds!
(4) We have initiate forging system of turrets. Upgrade to a 10,000 times turret and enjoy the game!
(5) We have initiate ocean BOSS copy system! You can challenge the powerful deep-sea monsters with your friends.
(6) You can share your magical experience of exploring the seabed with your friends on Facebook.
(7) The game supports multiple languages including English and Malay and Vietnamese.

Ocean War Support: oceanwar01@hotmail.com
Thank you guys for playing Ocean War!

title: Fish Abyss - Build an Idle Ocean Aquarium
description:
Build a thriving ocean sanctuary splashing with aquatic life - all while you listen to the calming sounds of the ocean as whale song echoes in a distant reef.

Hundreds of Fish to Collect

Discover all the fish in the sea and bring them to your aquarium. From koi and clownfish to majestic creatures that would never fit in your fish tank, such as dolphins, sharks and humpback whales and even more exotic species - we have them all to collect and grow at the tap of your finger!

The World‚Äôs Largest Fish Tank

Dive into the world‚Äôs largest fishtank - your own aquarium sanctuary! Customise your underwater oasis with corals, seaweed, rocks and attract new species of fish to your deep sea aquarium in this relaxing underwater sim.

Journey into the Depths of the Ocean

Begin your adventure in a secluded reef as you discover your way through the depths of the aquamarine world, one tap at a time.

Relaxing Gameplay

A relaxing family simulator game full of life, build your beautiful virtual underwater tycoon where marine life can thrive - all as you listen to the zen music of whale songs in a distant reef.

Real Schools of Fish

The marine life in your reef will find friends and form schools of fish, just like real fish majestically weaving in and out of the coral (and avoiding sharks!) using our advanced behaviour simulator.

Care for Your Aqua Pets

Create the ultimate fish farm. Hatch eggs and feed your underwater creatures to level them up. Merge your fish to breed them into more special, unique pet fish. 

Fish Abyss is completely free to play but some optional in-game items may require payment.

You must read and accept our Privacy Notice and Terms & Conditions before downloading this app.

Privacy Notice: https://www.foxieventures.com/privacy
Terms & Conditions: https://www.foxieventures.com/terms

comments: I love this game. Super calm and relaxing. I love the fish and the view. It's great! However, I find myself not having enough life or food to play for more than a minute or two, even with my life at a x12 multiplier and my food at a x9 multiplier. There should be more ways to earn food and life and/or lower the cost of the fish/food consumption.

Okay this is going to sound like promoting the app but im just saying what i genuinely think. Its really well made. Its relaxing, soothing, fun, simple, bright, colourful, addictive and just really nice to play. The UI is easy to navigate and the fish make you feel like you are caring for them. THE FISH ACT LIKE FISH! Every other fish based aquarium app i have had the fish have acted like... not fish. These ones do. All in all, great app fun and relaxing. Well done guys!
i like the game but it would be great if there was a way to regain my levels. i had to start over and thres no option to regain all that i had.

Cool at first. They jack prices up after buying every fish that you cant get ahead. Iv spent $20 and didnt get far. If it wasnt for raising the prices so high i would keep this game and rate 5 star. Unless you plan to spwnd $100 plus expect to be disappointed.

PAY TO PLAY! Got to level 19, and now cannot get enough resources to move forward without paying. They trick you with dolphins, and it all goes to PTP. I'm still enjoying the game. The graphics are really cool, and I'd like to see much more added to the game play. If you're going to drop money, this game has the potential to be worth it. Really needs a widget to watch & play on.

title: Raft Survival 3D - Crafting In Ocean
description:
In Raft Survival 3D - Crafting In Ocean game, you can imagine that you are only one person is survived after catastrophic crash in ocean! You found yourself all alone on the small raft wandering in the ocean. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of debris passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash! Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive! The angry and hungry shark is always near your raft, waiting for you to fall down so you gotta be careful! Gather resources from the water to craft equipment and instruments, find food and drinkable water to stay alive and expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in!

Explore this survival island full of mysterious places such as sunken pirate ship and caves full of treasures! Salvage survival tools and weapons that may help you to explore the island! Hunt wild animals to make it your next meal, find weapons to protect yourself from predators, quarry resources and craft useful tools using special workshops. Use your survival skills to stay alive, avoid battling against furious island predators and discover the secrets of Ocean Island with amazing survival simulator in 3D! Hunt, fish or gather plant food to stay alive, build shelters to hide from predator and enjoy peaceful life on a desert island with Ocean Island Survival 3D game!

Are your ready for ultimate survival experience? Control your character with a joystick, move around the island or swim in the ocean to find treasures, weapons and tools that would help you to survive! Be accurate, tropical jungles are full of predators and other wild animals ready to attack! Find or craft weapons such as guns, bows or hammers to battle for your life against animals! Dive into the atmosphere of realistic desert island and explore wilderness! Use your exploration, battling and survival skills to stay alive with Ocean Island Survival simulator in 3D!

Try to catch barrels, leaves, wood and other staff standing lonely on a raft! Beautiful ocean, wind, waves what else is needed? Yes anything. So throw your hook and try to catch staff!


Raft Survival 3D - Crafting In Ocean Features:

- Ultimate island survival simulator in 3D

- Amazing crafting system - craft weapons, tools and even furniture for your shelter

- Huge pirate island to explore - wild predators to hunt, sunken ships full of treasures, plant food to gather and more

- Health, energy and fullness indicators for your survivor

- Swim, hunt, battle and explore - do anything you want to stay alive!
descriptionHTML:
In Raft Survival 3D - Crafting In Ocean game, you can imagine that you are only one person is survived after catastrophic crash in ocean! You found yourself all alone on the small raft wandering in the ocean. There are no signs of earth nearby. You see all kinds of debris passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash! Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive! The angry and hungry shark is always near your raft, waiting for you to fall down so you gotta be careful! Gather resources from the water to craft equipment and instruments, find food and drinkable water to stay alive and expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in!

Explore this survival island full of mysterious places such as sunken pirate ship and caves full of treasures! Salvage survival tools and weapons that may help you to explore the island! Hunt wild animals to make it your next meal, find weapons to protect yourself from predators, quarry resources and craft useful tools using special workshops. Use your survival skills to stay alive, avoid battling against furious island predators and discover the secrets of Ocean Island with amazing survival simulator in 3D! Hunt, fish or gather plant food to stay alive, build shelters to hide from predator and enjoy peaceful life on a desert island with Ocean Island Survival 3D game!

Are your ready for ultimate survival experience? Control your character with a joystick, move around the island or swim in the ocean to find treasures, weapons and tools that would help you to survive! Be accurate, tropical jungles are full of predators and other wild animals ready to attack! Find or craft weapons such as guns, bows or hammers to battle for your life against animals! Dive into the atmosphere of realistic desert island and explore wilderness! Use your exploration, battling and survival skills to stay alive with Ocean Island Survival simulator in 3D!

Try to catch barrels, leaves, wood and other staff standing lonely on a raft! Beautiful ocean, wind, waves what else is needed? Yes anything. So throw your hook and try to catch staff!

- Health, energy and fullness indicators for your survivor

Good game shark game but very easy make the house find wood at all,
Wow great game,but i wish there is a day mode..only night mode even if is a day mode..but all in all,very addicting game..
Why would you copy another game?
Good game very very

title: Ocean Splash Match 3: Free Puzzle Games
description:
Dive into the cozy sea world of Ocean Splash and discover the best new free match 3 puzzle game!

Deep under the ocean water lies a dreamland of sparkling seashells, cute starfish and other marine life waiting for you to tap, swap, and blast around! Play fun and clever match 3 puzzle games in hundreds of underwater levels! Enjoy dynamic obstacles and brilliant puzzles designed for your fun only!
Ocean Splash is cute but clever, and all you have to do is relax and have fun! In this brilliant game you can swap, tap, and match without distraction.
After all, the most important person in this ocean world is YOU.


Reasons to love Ocean Splash:

üê† Discover a cozy ocean world
Relax with a sea world dreamland unlike any other match 3 puzzle game. Meet and match cute ocean friends like starfish, seashells, jellyfish and more as you swim through the coral and discover the marine life.

üê† Endless match 3 fun
Get caught in the wave of Ocean Splash mania! Swap and match through challenging underwater levels that were designed to be fun and fun alone, not to take your money!

üê° Totally free to play
Ocean Splash is completely free to play! No lives, stamina, or energy needed! Play match 3 puzzles for as long as you want without needing to recharge - all for free!

üê† No internet and no wifi needed
Tap, swap, match and blast to your heart's delight even when you have no data! You can enjoy the Ocean Splash mania offline too!

üê† Blast blocks with free rewards
The deep underwater ocean is filled with pirate treasure (and, yes, starfish)! You get free rewards and boosters while you play to make the match 3 puzzle games even more fun and cozy!

comments: Nice bright graphics and straightforward gameplay. Pure match 3 with no lengthy story attached.

Ads are skippable, and the game doesn't do addictive, casino-style extortionary microtransactions like some other games *cough*(CandyCrush)*coughcough*. That's all I wanted. And the sound effects are satisfying, with no high-pitched "GREAT!!üåüüåüüëçüåàüåü" after every dang combo.
Really fun Match 3 game. No waiting hours to get more lives. Varied levels. Never boring.
Cute graphics, but super easy to play, not challenging at all (I am on level 61)
Well, I loved the game till the update. Now the game won't open. BEWARE OF THE RECENT UPDATE!

title: Ocean Overlord
description:
Ocean Overlord is the newest free classic battleship mobile game. The first battleship game with a single global server, creating a true global free-for-all environment. The game includes over 200 elaborately designed battleship models and more than 100 modern famous navy generals to help you create and lead your own invincible fleet and conquer the whole world!
The game is set in the early 20th Century when the world was still shrouded in darkness after World War I.  Your job is to lead the anti-fascist movement, blow the horn of justice, gather like-minded people, eliminate the world‚Äôs dark forces and restore world peace!

„ÄêGame Features„Äë:
1.***Exquisite Battleship Models & Cool Visual Effects***
Over 200 carefully crafted battleship models, including legendary vessels from USA, Germany, Britain, Soviet Union, France etc.

2.***100 Famous Navy Generals & Prominent Battle Strategies***
Dubbed human voices and realistic graphics help bring historic Generals back to life. Gather different famous modern Generals, each with their own special traits, and watch as they change the face of a battle in the blink of an eye.

3.***Innovative Strategy Battle Mode & Original War Scenery***
Ignite your war genes and command up to 12 Generals to lead up to 72 battleships, aircraft carriers, and cruisers into battle.

4.***Elaborate Battle Plot***
Occupy the world‚Äôs famous ports and cities one by one, recreate original famous battles and devise effective strategies and tactics. 

5.***Various PVPÔºåPVE Game Modes***
Multiple fascinating game modes, including Legion battles, Anti-ship exercises, Air-defense exercises etc.

6.***Single Global Server***
Fight for your country, enjoy real-time translation, create online friendships and build your own great online Alliance battle in the single global server. 

Exquisite battleships, furious battles, lifelike speech and explosive music together create the perfect ‚ÄúOcean Overlord‚Äù.  Download now to discover other wonderful features!

„ÄêContact Us„Äë
Official Customer Support Email: mooen-support@oasgames.com
Facebook Fan page: https://www.facebook.com/Ocean.Overlord.en/

title: Ocean Sweep: Fun Match 3 Games for Ocean Cleanup.
description:
üê≥ We are helping to save the ocean! üê≥

Ocean Sweep Fun Match 3 Games also independently helps NGO's spread awareness on and solve marine pollution. So, if you want a fun match three game to play while you take part in our drive to save the ocean, this game is for you! 

üê† Game Story: üê† 

Help Bobby and his marine animal friends solve puzzle quests and spread awareness on the effects of ocean plastic pollution and how we can prevent it from destroying our oceans. Playing the game is easy. Crush and smash the plastic trash like bags, straws, bottles, and other waste materials polluting our ocean to solve the puzzle and clear the stage. 

üê¨ Game Play Features: üê¨

- Clean the ocean from pollution and save marine lives.
- Fun and entertaining ways to switch, crush, and smash the trash.
- Prevent the Kraken from reaching people so you can save the day.

title: Ocean Puzzle
description:
This is an entertaining and educational puzzle game which introduces various marine creatures. We start from the coast, pass through the coral reef area and to the ocean finally. Visit the magical and mystic marine life by a variety of different environments.

The ocean is the mother of life and carries a diverse and abundant life. 70% of the earth‚Äôs surface is composed of ocean. Undoubtedly, there is such rich life system in the blue ocean.Let‚Äôs love and understand them from heart. Encourage our children to know more about them and become the hope of marine conservation in the future.

Introduction of the game:
The photo will be cut into 3x3 or 4x4 disarranged pieces. You must put all puzzle pieces at the correct position. You can press "Hint" to check the whole photo or press "introduction" to see the information of the animal. When you complete it, you can set the photo as your wallpaper and go to next game.

We always do our best to test the program while we release it. However, there are various models of mobile phone for Android system. Please kindly Email to us , tell us what step cause bug. We very appreciate your understanding and support.

title: Ocean Forests
description:
The most FUN a kid can have swimming with sharks, fish and other creatures under the sea! Adventure-packed Ocean Forests is full of realistic underwater environments to explore, fun games and STEM-based vocabulary to satisfy children‚Äôs curiosity for the amazing world around them. This award-winning app has earned the praise of Common Sense Media, USA Today, Children‚Äôs Technology Review, Modern Mom and Smart Apps for Kids.

Ocean Forests¬†is rich with entertaining activities and unique benefits specially designed for kids ages 5-8:

- Fun-filled games to challenge kids‚Äô Reading and Science skills (Kindergarten - 3rd ¬†grade Levels)

- State of the art 3D animation and realistic graphics combined with touch screen responsive navigation bring sea creatures and their amazing underwater world to life¬†

- Let your kids freely explore and search for new species in an unstructured, and safe educational and entertaining environment¬†

- Expand the minds of young learners beyond fictional stories with scientifically accurate information that leaves them wanting to know more

- This immersive app provides opportunities to learn, play and experience ocean life while expanding language and reading skills

How does this fun-filled app benefit kids?

It‚Äôs all about the vocabulary, nonfiction vocabulary to be exact. Authentic, nonfiction reading is the most vocabulary-rich option for fostering the expansion of children's vocabularies. The breadth and depth of a child's vocabulary is directly correlated to that child's reading comprehension. In fact, the vocabulary of a child entering first grade predicts not only his/her reading ability at the end of first grade, but at the end of 11th grade (Juel and Deffes, 2004). And, nonfiction reading comprehension can have a significant impact on STEM-based testing and career success.

title: Ocean Live Wallpaper
description:
Ocean 3D live wallpaper is a very vivid undersea wallpaper which will bring you to a enchanting and fascinating underwater seaworld marine life. Beautiful undersea tropical fishes, turtles, manta ray, seahorses, turquoise water, corals, seaweed, ruins, pottery vases, treasure box may be from Titanic sunken in the Pacific Ocean or Indian Ocean! Moreover, there is probably an ancient seaworld castle waiting for user to explore. Blue Ocean 3D brings you the best underwater experience free of cost. Try to catch the tropical fish, seahorses or manta rays as they hide in the corals or seaweed of deep sea.

3D rendered in OpenGL 2.0 which makes you feel like you are in the real deep Indian ocean or Pacific Ocean seaworld. Blue Ocean 3D sets you down on the seabed with beautiful corals, you definitely will admire how fascinating the deep sea turquoise seabed is. You can lie down enjoying the natural beam of light falling on the seabed as the waves sway while surrounded by countless vivid undersea treasures like colorful marine animals swimming around in the deep sea including tropical fishes, turtles, sharks, seahorses, manta rays and seaweed, treasure box and many vases fallen on the seabed down from pirates of the Caribbean. You can also scroll left and right to appreciate turquoise ocean underwater scene from different angles which gives the real 3D effects. Moreover, you can interact with treasure boxes, manta rays, turtles, seahorses and tropical fishes, open the treasure chest from Titanic to discover gold, knock over the pottery vases and tap on the tropical fishes to see them swim away deep into the turquoise water of marine world. All this can provide you the best vivid user experience of a deep sea underwater world to see real marine life. You might find Titanic in the seaworld of Indian Ocean or Pacific Ocean.

If you ever wanted to scuba dive in the marine world of Indian ocean or Pacific Ocean or wanted to see how Titanic looks in the seaworld, you will love this vivid undersea wallpaper. You will love to see how the turquoise water of Indian ocean or Pacific ocean looks with sand lying on the seabed and seaweed and corals in the deep sea giving you the real feeling of marine life. No tsunami scare, no danger! Just enjoy the view.

A full (free + paid) list of features and customizable settings are below:

Panning ‚Äì decide how the camera will pan when you move around in the marine life background.

Auto Pan Speed (free) ‚Äì Set a panning speed.

Foreground fish (free) ‚Äì Decide to show or not foreground fish.

Background fish (free) ‚Äì Decide to show or not background fish.

Pottery ‚Äì Decide to show or not. Touch the pottery vase or buy more colorful pottery vase.

Treasure Chest ‚Äì Decide to show or not. Obtained from Titanic maybe !!

Other creatures - You can purchase other beautiful undersea creatures like Turtles, Sharks, Manta Rays and Seahorses to your wallpaper giving you more vivid marine life experience. The corals and seaweed are totally free.

Blue Ocean 3D is best suitable for both tablets and smart phones and is designed for portrait and landscape modes. This live wallpaper has been tested on the latest Android system. Please contact us if it doesn't work on your device.

title: Ocean Squid Simulator - dive into animal survival!
description:
Survival and adventure await underwater with your ocean animal family!

Dive into the world of wild underwater nature with our new animal survival simulator and become a exotic ocean animal - a squid! Try living and under animal life - complete quests, fight predators and  explore ocean bed. Sea of adventures and challenges awaits Ocean Squid Survival! 

In Ocean Squid Survival you will find:

>UNDERWATER WILD LIFE
Face different dwellers of the ocean animal world

>SUBMARINE ADVENTURES
Complete quests and missions in the underwater world

>AN OCEAN TO EXPLORE
Discover all secrets and landmarks of the ocean bed

>SURVIVAL AND FAMILY
Create an animal family with other squid and fight for survival

Wild ocean adventure!
Fight for survival in the ocean and do other underwater stuff - take on animal quests and explore the ocean! Find some squid trouble to make squid family bigger, survival in the ocean easier and your underwater life more exciting! 

Underwater family!
Find other squid and make an animal family - together you will explore the ocean and fight for survival. But be ready to defend your ocean squid family from underwater dangers. Finding food, fighting enemies and completing quests - survival underwater is a hard but fun in Ocean Squid Simulator. 

A world to explore!
Swim with your squid through the ocean of underwater animal survival in Ocean Squid Survival! Get ready for survival in the ocean of an underwater simulator. Ocean squid survival is better than mundane life. 

Wild ocean unfolds in our animal survival simulator! Learn more about squid life and survival with the underwater survival simulator!

Find other squid and make an animal family - together you will explore the ocean and fight for survival. But be ready to defend your ocean squid family from underwater dangers. Finding food, fighting enemies and completing quests - survival underwater is a hard but fun in Ocean Squid Simulator.

A world to explore!
Swim with your squid through the ocean of underwater animal survival in Ocean Squid Survival! Get ready for survival in the ocean of an underwater simulator. Ocean squid survival is better than mundane life.

Wild ocean unfolds in our animal survival simulator! Learn more about squid life and survival with the underwater survival simulator!
summary: Survival and adventure await underwater with your ocean animal family!
comments: Played it for less than 5 minutes, I got bored fast. With a terrible rig and the horrendous mix of hyper realistic and low poly the graphics look ripped off of some model market. The ground is so extremely vibrant that I could not possibly imagine it being the ocean floor. The basic controls (mobile joystick) and the janky up-down slider were insanely fast and uncomfortable, I couldn't position myself over.a fish- and believe me, I tried. This game is a waste of time, battery, and storage.

title: Ocean Sounds Relax n Sleep
description:
Want to relax your mind? Do you need music for meditation, therapy or yoga classes? "Ocean Sounds relax n Sleep" is what you need!

Our soothing nature sounds app has 9 relaxing sounds of the ocean, sea and waves that help you to sleep.

1) waves on beach
2) lapping waves and sea gulls
3) ocean waves crushing
4) boat on waves
5) beach waves
6) seagulls and waves
7) north sea
8) creek
9) waterfall

F.A.Q. :

Q: How could I set sound as alarm in my phone?
A: "Set as Alarm" command will not affect existing alarms, only the new ones you create. You can delete existing alarm and create new one.

Q: Is it possible for program auto turn off after specified time?
A: Yes. Just press clock button in the top left corner of the screen. Set up amount of time and press START button.

The purpose of Ocean sounds Relax n Sleep :

+ only natural music, no musical instruments, white noise
+ beautiful ocean live wallpaper
+ sea relax and sleep sounds and ringtones!

description:
Whale life is full of adventures. With our whale survival quest you can check it. Try it! Explore the ocean in search of quest mysteries. In Ocean Whale Simulator Quest you must behave like an animal, and think like a human. Be ocean animal or swim just for pleasure. Level¬≠up your whale to improve animal survival skills in the survival simulator. Form a ocean killer whale pod and breed a whale and be stronger to solve quests.

- Interesting sea adventures
- Funny quest characters
- Main and optional quests
- Ocean predators
- Whale upgrades
- Cruel ocean atmosphere
- Whale groups
- Limited oxygen simulator
- Wild animal behavior simulator
- Day and night cycles
- Power artifacts
- Big wild world simulator
- Many sea animal species

- Babies breeding

Explore the ocean and look for antient artifacts! Start your ocean adventures with our simulator. Follow the story line, find all clues of mysterious events in the sea! Level¬≠up your animal to improve whale survival skills. Form a pod and breed a whale.

Ocean Whale Simulator Quest lets you to be in whale's skin as if you are a real ocean animal in mysterious ocean locations. Explore the ocean among ice fields. In Ocean Whale Simulator Quest you will help other animals and do many quests.

Try how to ride your ocean animal, eat and kill. Explore all places in the simulator and do many other animal things.

title: Baby Shark Match: Ocean Jam
description:
Baby shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo ‚ô¨
Be part of Ollie & the Shark Family's ocean life, full of unexpected surprises!

Pinkfong's Baby Shark song has been sweeping over the globe, now with its very own Match-3 puzzle game, Baby Shark Match: Ocean Jam!

‚Ä¢ Rescue Our Friends! - Save Baby Shark's friends trapped inside the bubbles by sending them over to Sea Urchins! Their pointy edges will help them break free!
