descriptionHTML:
Baby shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo ‚ô¨
Be part of Ollie & the Shark Family's ocean life, full of unexpected surprises!

Pinkfong's Baby Shark song has been sweeping over the globe, now with its very own Match-3 puzzle game, Baby Shark Match: Ocean Jam!

„ÄêSpecial Features„Äë
‚Ä¢ Join Ollie, the Baby Shark in 5 different play modes!
‚Ä¢ Make more combos to create unique Shark Family boosters & get higher scores!
‚Ä¢ Unlock special prizes each time you earn 20 coins!

5 Different Play Modes to Dive in!
‚Ä¢ Rescue Our Friends! - Save Baby Shark's friends trapped inside the bubbles by sending them over to Sea Urchins! Their pointy edges will help them break free!
‚Ä¢ Play Hide & Seek! -The Shark Family is hiding. Use your matching skills to spot them!
‚Ä¢ Sand Cleanup- Keep the ocean clean by clearing the sandy mess.
‚Ä¢ Find Ocean Treasure - Make your best match to help William the fox discover new treasure in the ocean!
‚Ä¢ Twinkle Twinkle Starfish-Let the starfish shine! It's up to your matching abilities to free them!

A New Match-3 Puzzle Game with the Baby Shark!
The global entertainment company, Smart Study has partnered up with the award-winning puzzle game creator, Bitmango to provide the newest Match 3 addition to the mobile game series! Ready to dive right into the puzzle challenge?

Baby Shark Match: Ocean Jam is available on mobile phones & tablet PCs.
Baby Shark Match: Ocean Jam contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
Baby Shark Match: Ocean Jam is free to play, however, you may purchase In-app items, such as AD FREE & coins.

This application is distributed under the official rights from the license holder.
Developed by BitMango. Copyright 2018. Smart Study Co., Ltd. all rights reserved.

We value your feedback!
Please contact us at help@bitmango.com for any questions or suggestions

Visit Bitmango to check out more of our projects!
http://www.bitmango.com/

Visit our Facebook to enrich your gaming experience!
https://business.facebook.com/Baby-Shark-Match-Ocean-Jam-2604214646469635/

App Permissions

[Required Permissions]
- None

[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data

[Permission setting and withdrawal method]
- Android 6.0+: Device Settings> Application Management> Select App> Revoke Access

title: Raft Survival Ocean Escape
description:
Want to enjoy the ocean life games & perks of living on vast survival water with horrible shark attack? Then start your life mission on surface of Deep Ocean with wood craft raft. Raft Survival Ocean Escape is one of the best game that you need. The game full story about raft survival who survive on the deep ocean nicely and survive for many years. May be! You will experience this survival mission in real life, after playing this shark survival multiplayer you will expert how to survive in real life. So, let's start the mission with challenging survival games & shark attack.

When the game start you have selected own choice character, build a boat and use headphones to make interesting with full sound. In Deep Ocean you have to save yourself from ocean animals like sharks in this ocean free survival game. Move your craft in any direction you want but keep eye open because there is no navigation map available and make it more challenging and exciting. Experience challenging survival escape story after a ship crash which made this rafting life possible. In early mission you found yourself alone and no earth found only water and sea animals that can attack any time you have saved from them at any cast. This multiplayer raft survival come across mountains while driving raft or you may collide with another raft or crash ship, you have survive at the end and make ways to life on the ocean. You can kill the sea animals and use as a food but save from them firstly. You are provided with different sharp knives, arrows to keep yourself safe from whale attack and shark attacks. You can kill them in single attack because cannot survive more one single injuries can destroy it.  

Enjoy and survive with wood raft but keep your senses active in this rafting survival escape game. Make your escape story in this surviving game which includes crafting building and full of adventures. You have to complete different rafting survival missions in this online & free multiple survival game and take your woody raft from one point to another. Enjoy lot of ocean activity with solo mission and unlimited challenging wood raft. Stunning weather with rainy and navigation gap for time based survival mission. Surly you will enjoy this shark attack survival game but don't forget rate us.

Raft Survival Ocean Escape Features:

-Enjoy Raft survival with deep ocean shark attack
-Challenging survival mission with smooth controls
-Escape story based on raft survival man
-Avoid to coiled with other raft and save crashing
-Real water mission survival with shark attacks
-Build and expand your home of wreckage to a buoyant fortress.
-Realistic environment with cool graphics of ocean life games

title: Ocean Survival 3 Raft Escape
description:
New adventures in the ocean are waiting for you! Get ready to unravel all the secrets on tropical islands.

You continue your journey on a raft in the deep ocean. Left alone with the wildlife you have to survive on the island. Rely on yourself.
 You must escape from islands.

Collect resources all over the map. The world is completely open to exploration! Solve the mysteries of the islands!

Collect food and cook meals on the fire. To survive the night you need to build a hut and bonfire on a raft. Build yourself a house that you want!

A workbench will help you create new items and tools. Place it next to you on a raft and use accumulated resources, such as wood, stone, boards.

Explore the underwater world! Treasure chests are hidden there. But beware of sharks.

Start exploring the ocean now!

title: VR Ocean Aquarium 3D
description:
You can explore a new world by diving into the deep ocean and have an enjoyable journey to see different fish species. Scuba Diving experience will be great with the VR Ocean Aquarium 3D.

You can learn the names of the fish and look them closely. When you approach a fish, the movement will be slower so that you can closely examine the details. Just look at another place to move again.

You can show your fish-hunting skills in deep blue seas and pass joyful time. The game mechanics are pretty easy. 8 different levels are included in the game.

You can play the game in VR Cardboard or in Normal mode. The application is totally free.

Important: Samsung Galaxy S8, S8+ and Note8 users, please make sure to enable WQHD+ resolution to prevent crash and play the game in best settings. Settings > Display > Screen resolution > WQHD+ > APPLY

FEATURES:
- VR Cardboard or Normal Mode support
- 107 different types of fishes
- Easy usage
- Very beautiful graphics. Realistic ocean environment
- Scuba diving experience
- Nice animated fish in the ocean
- Gamepad / Bluetooth controller support

HOW TO PLAY:
- Automatic Mode: It is very easy. Just look at where you want to swim. When you approach a fish, the movement will be slower so that you can closely examine the details. Just look at another place to move again. 
- Gamepad Controller: You can play the game by using Gamepad / Bluetooth controller.
- Magnet Sensor: You can use magnet sensor to stop & examine the place around you.
- Manual Mode: You can play the game by using the virtual joystick and buttons on the screen, without changing your place. Additionally, you can see the around in 360 degrees.

Please vote for our app so that we will be adding more VR apps and develop it better.

Important: Samsung Galaxy S8, S8+ and Note8 users, please make sure to enable WQHD+ resolution to prevent crash and play the game in best settings. Settings > Display > Screen resolution > WQHD+ > APPLY

FEATURES:
- VR Cardboard or Normal Mode support
- 107 different types of fishes
- Easy usage
- Very beautiful graphics. Realistic ocean environment
- Scuba diving experience
- Nice animated fish in the ocean
- Gamepad / Bluetooth controller support

HOW TO PLAY:
- Automatic Mode: It is very easy. Just look at where you want to swim. When you approach a fish, the movement will be slower so that you can closely examine the details. Just look at another place to move again.
- Gamepad Controller: You can play the game by using Gamepad / Bluetooth controller.
- Magnet Sensor: You can use magnet sensor to stop & examine the place around you.
- Manual Mode: You can play the game by using the virtual joystick and buttons on the screen, without changing your place. Additionally, you can see the around in 360 degrees.

Please vote for our app so that we will be adding more VR apps and develop it better.
summary: You can explore a new world by diving into the deep ocean

I really hope this app comes with a HUGE improvement, I'll give 5 starsüåü üåü üåü üåü üåü if it does ‚ô• I'll be expecting it.

title: Survival on Raft: Ocean
descriptionHTML:
Survival on Raft: Ocean - is a second part of our previous game. You are again ocean traveler, but with new hope and old problems. You're lost! No civilization! Only cold salt water and creatures. Craft anything or become nothing!

New features:
- high quality graphics: this is the first game of raft survival setting on Play with realistic graphics;
- new core of game: comparing with our previous part, we re-write craft & inventory core;
- less enemies - more danger: we delete whale, but we make a shark more wise and dangerous;
- more craft resources: as in past this is sandbox open world ocean game with many types of new props and buildings.

"This is the game for the whole family. It will teach how to craft things and why something works in that way! Start to build your raft or make your own island!... Repair your raft and go home!... It's up to you!" - we left this phrase as many YouTube bloggers laugh on it, so we are. Now it's a moto of the game with your help!

ATTENTION: last month (06.09.2019) our game "Survival on Raft" was removed from Play, because of many errors with transferring game to a new Unity Engine. Google Developer Support advised us to improve it and re-publish. That's what we did the whole month. Please, give us you support and feedback!
summary: Dive into ocean...! Breathe! You are survival on raft again...
recentChanges:
New version of Survival on Raft: Ocean
- fixed save problems;
- fixed environment simulator.

Start your craft and survival adventure!
comments: Fun game. Controls for moving are good. When you first start the game, it's very difficult to figure it out. A tutorial would be nice. I think the water and food meter goes down too fast, and it should take longer to make water and to fish. Also, why are there so many sharks?? Inventory should be larger. Overall, it's an addicting game, but it needs some improving

I didn't like them, not simple enough. I like that this game is about basic survival before other gameplay. 3 stars Last edit: still not saving properly. 1 star

Gives u important information & location's of all types of sharks keep up the good work.
There's no tutorial so u gotta figure it out on ur own. Tried crafting boards and wouldn't let me exit and couldn't figure out how to get water so I thirst to death. Uninstalling. Not worth my time.

title: Ocean Deep Survival
descriptionHTML:
Ocean Survival For Stranded Deep ‚Äì is a simulator game with survival setting. Your journey starts in the Open Ocean on a boat. Shark almost stopped your survival‚Ä¶ But than, you woke up on island.

Ocean isn‚Äôt so dangerous when you are on island. But island isn‚Äôt safe place too. Dive to the underwater ocean deep to reveal secrets or gather food on the stranded deep of the island. Craft your new home and become a king of the island. It‚Äôs up to you to become a slave on a raft or to a king of craft! Reveal the secrets of famous triangle in Bermuda lost survival is started!

Main features of Ocean Survival For Stranded Deep
- The sequel of original island survival ‚ÄúLost Survival: Stranded Deep of Bermuda‚Äù;
- New types of craft items from simple (like props) to composite (like second floor, roof);
- Dozens of weapons and armors ‚Äì just craft what you need;
- Island creatures and enemies;
- Day and night changing cycles and different behaviours.

The game is still underdevelopment so you can add something uncommon ‚Äì just share us your ideas. Sandbox mode on island is available right now. You craft anything you like. It‚Äôs more like open test mode (hurry to try, than we will close that mode).

ATTENTION: This is an early access game, that‚Äôs why we are open for your brilliant ideas and hardest critics to make the game better! The game can be described as mix (and inspiration) of such masterpieces as raft, stranded deep, Bermuda lost survival and subnautica and it combines all the best features of them. Also, the game is based on our previous game - ‚ÄúLost Survival: Stranded Deep of Bermuda‚Äù which was deleted in September. All the content is made by us (developers), bought and/or under free common license. All the coincidences with games upper and all rights for them are owned by original developers and we don‚Äôt need ‚Äòem. We just want to make great new game for us and such fans as we are!
summary: Start your lost Ocean Survival For Stranded Deep. Craft your survival simulator!

title: Island Survival - Ocean Evo
description:
Welcome to the huge lost island in the ocean! You were here by chance and your task is to survive.
For this you need to collect loot, explore, craft and build.
At your disposal is an ax, a pickaxe, a torch, a bow and much more, all this will help to survive on an island full of dangers, rusty pipes, and unfriendly inhabitants.
For a start, build a reliable home, arrange it with a sleeping bag and a stove. Collect metal ore and wood, then you can melt it in the stove and craft powerful weapons,
to go to factories full of loot, and which are well guarded.

Advanced construction system: from simple houses to huge shelters using different materials!
Build a dream house and live through the cold nights.

- Do not forget about hunger, collect meat and supplies.
- Create a weapon that will be useful to you.
- Survive!

Features Island Survival - Ocean Evo:
- Study of new territories and wilderness
- Crafting a variety of things
- Construction of your home
- A game about survival !

title: Ocean Wars-Last Ship
description:
In a world of archipelagos, deep waters and unknown mysteries, you assume the role of an ambitious admiral. Settle in your island, develop, rise and wander through the seas. Establish powerful alliances with other admirals, expand your territory and clash against sea creatures, greedy pirates or even rivals who don't quite agree on your plans! Ocean Wars is a massively online RTS game gathering players from all over the world, where you will need to develop your island to collect its resources, build powerful fleets and sail across vast uncharted territories. 

Features:
- A massively multiplayer universe where you can unite or fight with players from all over the world.
- Join alliances, make friends and conquer the seas!
- Choose your tactic and formations: perform cross defenses, coordinated attacks‚Ä¶
- Your strategy and charisma will determine the future of your territories!
- Explore a vast world and discover its secrets, its endless resources and defeat fearsome creatures of the depths.

FacebookÔºöhttps://www.facebook.com/oceanwarsfanpage
If you have any feedback, please email us at cs.oceanwars@gmail.com

PLEASE NOTE: Ocean Wars game is free to download and free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. 
A network connection is required to play.

title: Ocean Mania
description:
Ocean Mania is a new matching puzzle from the makers of hit game Ice Crush!
Ocean Mania redefined match-3 games for mobile!
Follow Mermaid in the mysterious undersea world, match with oceaners, raise your fishes, save whales, hunt treasures, collect lobsters and corals, challenge octopus.
Take on your friends and join this story-driven adventure, you'll be addicted from the very first hit!
  
‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ Highlighted Features ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ
‚òÖ Eye-catching graphics which will bring you into the mysterious undersea world.
‚òÖ Compete with any players in the world, not only your facebook friends!
‚òÖ More than 10 different well-designed gameplay, and new gameplay will be added regularly.
‚òÖ Innovated system for you to raise your fishes.
‚òÖ Magical power-ups to help with tough levels!
‚òÖ Hundreds of well-designed free levels! Free levels and game modes will be added regularly! 
‚òÖ Facebook connected, easy to sync progress on different devices.
‚òÖ Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master: all with strategic swiping!

‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ How to Play ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ
‚òÖ Switch and match 3 or more same oceaners to reach the target.
‚òÖ Run your pond, raise your fishes, unlock power-ups for the preparation of tough levels.
‚òÖ Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get. Can you score high enough to earn 3 stars on every level?
‚òÖ Ocean Mania is completely free to play but some in-game items may require payment.

Best Match 3 game for women? Ocean Blast for sure! It's a casual game which gives you puzzles to solve, with a splashtastic match-3 experience. Unique hexagonal board is both challenging and fun. title: Ocean HD
description:
Dive down and immerse yourself in your own underwater world every time you use your device.

Explore the pristine waters of a deep ocean environment teeming with exotic sea life.  Discover a sunken ship, coral reef, and more as sunlight glints off hidden treasure.  Schools of fish swim past you while a manta ray glides overhead.  Or, dive into shallow seas and drift in azure blue waters - it's all up to you.  Watch closely and you may even see a shark in the distance!

Interact with the fish that swim nearby and the hidden treasure.  Customize your dive experience with hundreds of combinations - hide the ship, change the treasure to a diving helmet, choose from 'Shallow Seas' or 'Coral Life' themes, and much more!

Optional add-on packs are also available for purchase, allowing you to choose the features most meaningful to you. The 'Shark Pack' features Great White, Tiger, and Hammerhead sharks, new themes, and a shark cage and diver.  The 'Friendly Seas Pack' includes a Dolphin, Sea Turtle, interactive Seahorses, new themes and more!

This visually stunning live wallpaper is true 3D with hand-crafted artwork. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life and works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers.

title: Ocean Heroes : Make Ocean Plastic Free
description:
Ocean Heroes: Make Ocean Plastic Free - Play one of the most popular games with 5 mighty ocean heroes to reduce plastic from our oceans, for real!

Save Fishes, Turtles, Dolphins, and Endangered Animals while killing time!
Be on top of the Google Play Games Leaderboard by collecting plastic pollutants & saving fishes.
And yes, do this before getting attacked by Puffer Fish, Lion Fish, Mysterious Sea Creatures or getting eaten by the Hungry Sharks!

Choose Ocean Heroes To :
1. Be The Change to Save the Oceans. Play and collect as many Dropledge Credits.
2. Take Pledges & Create Actions for real to Stop Plastic disaster that‚Äôs plaguing the planet.
3. Come Forward. Participate in or support through your contributions.

Why is it Now or Never:
As per recent reports - Humans have made 8.3 billion tons of garbage since 1950. Which means -
‚Ä¢ Enough garbage is thrown away each year to circle the earth four times.
‚Ä¢ It's killing more than 1 million marine species annually. More than one million bags being used every minute.
‚Ä¢ Plastic pollution has reached such shocking levels that the Human Body is now absorbing chemicals, causing harmful human health effects.
Think about it‚Ä¶ Do we and the planet deserve this? It's Time we Act... NOW. Pledge to Stop Pollution.

Who is behind this app:
This game app is created by Dropledge - A Social Cause Based Technology Initiative and supported by Non-Governmental Organization(NGO) such as SagarShakti
It is a platform that creates a positive impact on issues in society as well as environmental issues without making it preachy, yet triggering the subconscious- to enable actions for real.

The game is supported all android devices and tablets from version 4.1 onwards
#dropledge #whereplayispurpose #oceanheroes #plasticfree #noplastic #plastic #antiplastic #plasticpollution #oceanpollution #marinepollution

Like US https://www.facebook.com/OceanHeroesGame/


Game is Developed by Dropledge https://www.dropledge.org/

comments: Unique concept and excellent execution. Mobile game attached with social cause. Kudos to the team who brought this idea on mobile gaming platform. Nice graphics and characters. More you play, more you get to know about the real facts of sea and its creatures. I am loving it and willing to play more levels. Do play and make pledge to avoid use of plastic.

A super entertaining game that is going to be a super hit on PlayStore too. what an innovative concept! Play collect plastic ,contribute and win. A gaming experience that made me think about contributing to make a positive impact on our planet Earth. kudos to the inventors of this game. Best wishes.

Stuff of champions, mind blowing concept with absolute relevance to today's scenario, not just any other game but one with purpose . Hope you guys bring out more concepts on present world challenges . Way to go.
This game is amazing fun so far. I haven't seen a game like this for quite sometime and I am glad to have discovered this game. It has that story/adventure feel which you don't see often.

The game is made with a very strong motive to reduce the plastic waste in the ocean. It's very easy to understand for school going children to learn what is harming the environment and ways to save it. Recommend it to everyone.

title: Ocean Busters Mania: Match 3
description:
Blast your way underwater through the deep blue ocean games area in Ocean Busters Mania!
Become one with the beautiful fish monsters by connect and swap during this matching game. Blue fish, red fish, yellow fish, it‚Äôs all in the deep blue ocean.


Match 3 beautiful fish monsters in a row or more as a chain to succeed the quest in a crazy way. Use your flash blast to win enough bonus coins. Swap and connect 3 in a row. Ocean games have never been so cool before! So colorful!

title: Ocean Sounds
description:
With OceanSounds app you get a variety of soundscapes thematically centered around oceans that you can easily customize for your daily activities. Ideally built for providing relaxing moments during a stressful day, a great background for meditation and a more natural sleep.

All sounds are freq optimized for mobile devices and hi-end speakers. For better acoustic experience just put on your headphones or plug it to your hi-fi system.

The nature ambiences are professionally recorded with high-end equipment and mastered at HQ resolution. All sounds can be used as ringtones, notifications or alarm and have been designed to relax you and positively motivate you for the day ahead.

title: ARCOCEAN - ARC OCEAN AR
description:
‚óã ARC OCEAN 
Future-oriented smart book in augmented reality
‚Ä¢ Look at realistic pictures
‚Ä¢ Read interesting texts
‚Ä¢ Experience realistic sea animals through augmented reality

‚óã What is Augmented Reality?
Augmented Reality is computer technology that brings virtual reality to the real world. It is an excellent smart educational technique that is used by the Ministry of Education and other advanced countries. ARC OCEAN is a book combined with augmented reality. Living sea animals appear in 3D when you point your smartphone or tablet PC at the book.

‚óã ARC OCEAN Book
‚Ä¢ When you open the book, breathtaking stories of ocean will start.
‚Ä¢ You will see the various features and lives of mysterious sea animals.
‚Ä¢ All the books are realistically designed and based on the latest scientific research.
‚Ä¢ The books have high-quality 3D illustrations and images.
‚Ä¢ Twelve animals are included: Pufferfish, Devil Ray, Squid, Japanese Flyingfish, Blackmouth Angler, Head Fish, Luna Lionfish, Orange Clownfish, Great White Shark, Killer Whale, Humpback Whale, Sea Turtle.

‚óã 3D Augmented Reality App 
Experience the augmented reality program yourself.
‚Ä¢ Move the sea animals where you want.
‚Ä¢ Watch the animals hunt for food.
‚Ä¢ Do fun activities such as looking at the habitat of sea animals, comparing sizes of sea animals, and doing puzzles.
‚Ä¢ Take pictures of you with the sea animals in a background you create.
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòFree‚Äô the sea animals from the device by pressing a button.

‚óã Requirements for smart terminals
- Android Version 2.2 or higher 
- iOS Version 4.3 or higher

‚óã ARC OCEAN App Testing 
1. Go to http://alzzam.co.kr/test/evo/ocean/testpage.html. Download or print the test images. 
2. Install ARC OCEAN application. 
3. Start the application and if you view the images you've downloaded or printed through your phone's camera, you can watch 3D content.

title: Ocean Animals - For Kids
description:
Come with us on a sea expedition and explore the fascinating world of sea animals wildlife!
The child-friendly sea animals lite puzzle collection for toddlers and children age 1-7 years. Try this ocean animals summer top hit for free now! Learn about the fish in the oceans.
With this cute summer beach vacation ocean peg puzzle collection your kid can playfully explore the animals of the sea. The perfect educational children's peg puzzle for a beach vacation, the summer or just for learning about sea animals and the world they live in with beautifully illustrated animal graphics.

Finding the pieces and place them into the correct shapes.

Features:
‚úî Your kid learns about the different ocean animals like sea horse, dolphin, turtle, clownfish, octopus, fish and more.
‚úî The preschool sea animal puzzle collection is suitable for toddlers and childrens.
‚úî Always new arrangement of the pieces of the puzzle - the peg puzzle is always exciting and varied for your kid.
‚úî For each correctly solved puzzle your child will receive a reward like funny bursting ballons.
‚úî Beautifully illustrated peg puzzle app with high-resolution graphics.
‚úî No third-party advertising.
‚úî Parental control - all external links can be turned off.

With this lite sea animals ocean wildlife puzzle app learning, education and playing makes fun!
The cute easy to play funny ocean animals peg puzzle promotes hand-eye coordination, logical thinking and your child's memory skills.

The perfect preschool puzzle game app for your toddler and kid! Dory children will love the lovely beautiful designs of this easy to play peg puzzle. The best app contains a lot of different animals, from clownfish to shark there is a lot to discover and explore in this lovely sea nature game for kids and toddlers age 0 to 7 years.

The best and great part for parents: You don¬¥t need to buy a 'real' expensive puzzle collection and you also never need to look for those missing pieces everywhere again. :)

Captain Nemo would be proud!

If you have questions or are interested in how we develop our apps together with children, send an email to: info@mcpeppergames.com

Please note: Rating the app and writing a review will help us create more apps for children. Thank you!

More cool apps and games for little boys and girls and kids age 1 to 8 you can find here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=5029755957860459217

Your McPeppergames team

title: Seaside Buoy: Ocean Temperature & Tides
description:
Great for surfing, diving, sailing, swimming or deciding if it's a good time to hit the beach. Check what time the next high/low tide is. Use the home screen widget to keep an eye on the water.

Live scientific readings from ocean buoys around the world. Data is provided by the National Data Buoy Center of NOAA and other public scientific organizations. Most buoys report water temperature and swell height, but some have more information available than others. Automatically select the closest buoy, choose one from the map, or choose from the list. Build a list of favorites for quick access to key buoys. With your device's location function turned on, bearing and distance to the buoy is calculated and displayed. This app is lightweight, easy-to-use, and requires virtually no data usage.

Currently, buoys are included from the following locations:

United States, including Alaska and Hawaii
US Virgin Islands
Puerto Rico
Caribbean
Gulf of Mexico
United Kingdom
Ireland
Sweden
Finland
Estonia
Latvia
Germany

title: Ocean Puzzle - Fish Match Game
description:
*****SEA BLAST MANIA IS A NEW FREE MATCH3 PUZZLE GAME LOADED WITH EXCITING GAMEPLAY & AMAZING OCEAN CREATURES VISUALS*****

Take a deep breath and dive into an underwater world of match-3 fun with Sea Blast mania, an all-new free game! 

The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.

Such is the allure of Sea Blast mania!!!!
And once you start playing this amazing addictive ocean themed match 3 Sea Blast game, you will never be able to let go. There's an exciting story to uncover and an ocean full of charming characters to meet along the way. So what are you waiting for?

Try the challenging and fun match-3 gameplay with unique puzzles as you keep on advancing the hundred of levels full of fish and sea animals. Play with them, swap the matching sea animals and fish and watch them vanish in a pop. Hey, your finned friends are waiting for you, so dive in now and enjoy this amazing underwater adventure! Blast away the levels at sea!

Take a plunge in this Sea Blasting popping game and discover:

 *  Explore an exciting aquatic world
 *  Unique gameplay & cool animation effects : swap and match sea animals
 *  Single Player & Multi player mode
 *  Arcade mode for super splashing fun!
 *  Auto Match option to help beat you levels quickly!
 *  Adorable Cute sea animals: fish, octopuses, starfish, sea horses and many others.
 *  Easy and fun to play ocean quest, yet challenging to fully master: all with strategic 
     swiping!
 *  Eye-catching graphics which will bring you into the mysterious undersea world
 *  Magical power-ups to help with tough levels!

Ahoy mate!!
        Dive in and join in the marine journey through the undersea kingdom. Sea Blast mania (Free Puzzle Match 3 Game) is one of the best addictive and fun match-3 game! New ocean creatures, new items, new elements, new excitement! Connect 3 or more same fish ocean animals to clear them. Match more to win rewards! 

Scout and explore Various missions deep in water full of fish and sea creatures! 

A unique and highly addictive action/ puzzle/ 3 match timing game for everyone, easy to grasp, but it will challenge your dexterity and tickle your brain the more you progress in the adventure.
Fantastic stylized graphics, refreshing addictive gameplay both simple and deep, cute and adorable characters.

How to play:
 -  Swap fish and sea animals between rows and columns with simple moves through 
     touch screen.
 -  Make a match of three sea fishes and creatures or more to crush or pop them up.
 -  Always look for similar color sea animals while solving this match3 case puzzles.
 -  Try to create as many as possible ocean blasts on wooden board in the background to 
     quickly move to the next levels.
 -  Identify boosters and match them with similar ocean fishes to create hexagons.
 -  Hexagons helps you in blasting complete row or column with a single move.

Splash the ocean creatures! Blast your way through the sea kingdom and become Aquaman!!
All you have to do is match 3 or more same sea animals in a line. And BAM!!! you have got a match. Unique hexagonal board is both challenging and fun.

An epic swapping sea blast bubble popping game, a treat to look at. Keeping you consistently interested in playing, exactly what you want from a casual game!! 

A breath of fresh air from other match 3 sea fish blasting games, even underwater a lot of fun. Easy to pick up and spectacularly amazing, it‚Äôs the sort of game that makes smartphone gaming so enjoyable

Best Match 3 game for all ages. Sea Blast mania for sure! It's a casual game which gives you puzzles to solve, with a splashtastic match-3 experience. 

So don't wait to take a jump into the sea world. Download this super fun & stunning breathtaking Sea Blast Mania game. Bubblesome sea creatures are waiting for you!!!!
 
We are at shore waiting for your feedback to make the game more enjoyable!
We would love to hear from you.

title: Mermaid Craft: Ocean Princess. Sea Adventure Games
description:
Dive under waters of a deep blue sea for a blocky cube exploration adventure! Become a mermaid - a princess of the sea - and rule the underwater ocean world! Change clothes and visit a mermaid hair salon to look like a queen. Mermaid Craft is one of the best new mermaid dress up & fashion games! 

Beautiful underwater world awaits
Deep blue ocean waters near the eden island archipelago hide many secrets‚Ä¶ The biggest one is a mermaid city! Start your sea adventure and dive underwater as a mermaid princess! Take part in an exploration of this ocean empire and visit mysterious underwater mine ruins! You can even find a sunken pirate ship and maybe an old pirate treasure‚Ä¶ But the exploration of a pirate ship might be really dangerous. Will you dare to embark on this sea quest in a fish kingdom of Mermaid Craft?

Crafting & building underwater
But a mermaid city is vast enough to give you countless hours of crafting & building fun! In Mermaid Craft you can expand it even further. Mine resources and then craft, build and design a blocky cube underwater city. Crafting & building on a coral reef - craft your own home! Use shells and seaweeds to design and decorate rooms like in a house builder game. Make a house party and invite your high school friends. Every mermaid princess loves it!

Meet friends or even‚Ä¶ a boyfriend!
As a mermaid princess you need a glamour look! Dress up and visit a mermaid hair salon. Meet with other mermaid friends or find a blocky pocket pet. Chat with many sea animals like a bass fish, salmon fish, whale, sea horse, sea turtle, shark, octopus or jellyfish. They love to spend time with their mermaid princess! It‚Äôs not some kind of ocean animal games, but still feels like a sea safari! During your sea adventure you meet a handsome triton prince as well‚Ä¶ Have you ever seen a mermaid in love? Now you can, because in Mermaid Craft you can have a boyfriend and go on dates like in real dating simulator! Love on the sea!

CORE FEATURES:
Become an ocean princess! Enjoy a deep blue sea adventure as a cute mermaid.
Exploration of a huge sandbox world - not only underwater!
Crafting & building world of mermaid - an ocean empire!
Change clothes and hair whenever you want!
Not only for girls with tails!

UPCOMING FEATURES:
Multi Craft - multiplayer mode! Start a sea adventure with best friends!
More sea animals. Enjoy a sea safari!
More items to craft. World of mermaids needs your crafting & building skills! 

It‚Äôs not one of the fishing games, so don‚Äôt get caught on a fishing hook. Befriend sea animals, explore an underwater paradise land and use your imagination in crafting & building mode to recreate a mermaid city at the bottom of an ocean empire. Sea adventure awaits you - what are you waiting for? DOWNLOAD NOW and enjoy a life as a mermaid princess - only in Mermaid Craft! The best sea adventure game for girls of 2017!

title: Continents, Oceans and Deserts
description:
Continents, Oceans, and Deserts helps the user to explore the
knowledge about various Continents, Oceans, and Deserts of the
world.
The use can find here the list of countries on specific continents
interesting facts, population and many more.
This app also allows the user to get their location to find them self about
the place where they are.

Use of the app
1. To find the details about the countries.
2. To find the details about oceans.
3. To find the details about deserts.
4. To find the details about continents.
5. To learn about facts and many details of countries
oceans and deserts.

The App displays basic and core information data of every continents, ocean, deserts around the world. Including official  name,Official  currency, Currency code, Government type, Languages spoken, Life Expectancy, Region, Population Density, Countries Population, Surface Area Of a  Country, Area code, Latitude, Longitude, Time zone , GMT, Blocs, Native name, Nationality name, each Country GDP of every continents, GDP per capita.
Also, this app gives you a brief data of near continents around the world that includes each country's cities current time clock, current weather reports and each city map locations. In addition to the above features, the app also analyzes the climatic behavior of every continent in six major important factors. This is a list of seas - large divisions of the World Ocean, including areas of water variously, gulfs, bights, bays, and straits. An ocean is a large body of water that is saline. 
Oceans are a major component of the Earth's hydrosphere of the Earth's surface. Although the oceans of the Earth are all connected and are truly one "World Ocean," most often the world is divided into five different oceans.
The ocean covers 71 percent of the Earth's global surface and contains 97 percent of the globe's water, yet more than 95 percent of the underwater world remains unexplored.
The oceans and lakes play an integral role in many of the Earth's systems including climate and weather. The ocean supports the life of nearly 50 percent of all species on Earth and helps 
Sustain that life providing 20 percent of the animal protein and five percent of the total protein in the human diet.
Up to now, we were discussing only the land masses on earth which covers only 30 percent of the earth‚Äôs surface. The larger portion of the earth‚Äôs surface is covered by
 Water.  70 percent of the earth‚Äôs surface is covered by water, out of which over 96 percent is salt water in our oceans. These large water bodies which surround the continents are  Called oceans. Though they are all interconnected, they are generally divided into 5 Oceans, namely, Pacific Ocean, Atlantic Ocean, Indian Ocean, Arctic Ocean and Antarctic Ocean.
Download ‚ÄúContinents, Oceans and Deserts app‚Äù .	
World info app is a great source of information to know about every continents and oceans and desert in the world. You can get any information about the globe. This app contains 7 continents 198 country information like capital, the country flag, and a pointer to the wiki to know more about the country.
Also, this app has geographical info about deserts and oceans. This app devoid of conveying any wrong info about any area. This app is most recommended for gaining knowledge about the world and its specifications over the different regions. 
The world has many geographical areas and vastly spread too. In this app, we have covered all the continental areas, ocean part as well and desert places also along with their changing  Weather conditions.

***MUST DOWNLOAD THIS APP  "Continents, Oceans and Deserts"  AND CATCH THE KNOWLEDGE ABOUT THE  WORLD AND FIND WHATEVER YOU WANT ABOUT  THE GLOBE***
A.S.O. :- Harsh Raju

oceans and deserts.

The App displays basic and core information data of every continents, ocean, deserts around the world. Including official name,Official currency, Currency code, Government type, Languages spoken, Life Expectancy, Region, Population Density, Countries Population, Surface Area Of a Country, Area code, Latitude, Longitude, Time zone , GMT, Blocs, Native name, Nationality name, each Country GDP of every continents, GDP per capita.
Also, this app gives you a brief data of near continents around the world that includes each country's cities current time clock, current weather reports and each city map locations. In addition to the above features, the app also analyzes the climatic behavior of every continent in six major important factors. This is a list of seas - large divisions of the World Ocean, including areas of water variously, gulfs, bights, bays, and straits. An ocean is a large body of water that is saline.
Oceans are a major component of the Earth's hydrosphere of the Earth's surface. Although the oceans of the Earth are all connected and are truly one "World Ocean," most often the world is divided into five different oceans.
The ocean covers 71 percent of the Earth's global surface and contains 97 percent of the globe's water, yet more than 95 percent of the underwater world remains unexplored.
The oceans and lakes play an integral role in many of the Earth's systems including climate and weather. The ocean supports the life of nearly 50 percent of all species on Earth and helps
Sustain that life providing 20 percent of the animal protein and five percent of the total protein in the human diet.
Up to now, we were discussing only the land masses on earth which covers only 30 percent of the earth‚Äôs surface. The larger portion of the earth‚Äôs surface is covered by
Water. 70 percent of the earth‚Äôs surface is covered by water, out of which over 96 percent is salt water in our oceans. These large water bodies which surround the continents are Called oceans. Though they are all interconnected, they are generally divided into 5 Oceans, namely, Pacific Ocean, Atlantic Ocean, Indian Ocean, Arctic Ocean and Antarctic Ocean.
Download ‚ÄúContinents, Oceans and Deserts app‚Äù .
World info app is a great source of information to know about every continents and oceans and desert in the world. You can get any information about the globe. This app contains 7 continents 198 country information like capital, the country flag, and a pointer to the wiki to know more about the country.
Also, this app has geographical info about deserts and oceans. This app devoid of conveying any wrong info about any area. This app is most recommended for gaining knowledge about the world and its specifications over the different regions.
The world has many geographical areas and vastly spread too. In this app, we have covered all the continental areas, ocean part as well and desert places also along with their changing Weather conditions.

title: Ocean Blue 3D
description:
Dive into the beautiful and breathtaking deep blue ocean with a glimpse of lively underwater sea life. The sunlight high above from crystal clear ocean surface beams through the depth of the blue ocean, together with animated coral that swing along with the sea current, and a school of fish swimming past the plankton, creates a magnificent scene that you would never forget.

   
Ocean Blue 3D is a 3D live wallpaper that mimics the real life diving experience. Many customizations and options such as sea turtle, percula clown fish and the magnificent manta ray ,are available to make Ocean Blue 3D live wallpaper much lively and exciting. Ocean Blue 3D is also designed to adapt to your device background, so the tones of color match to your icons and homescreen. Thus, Ocean Blue 3D features silky smooth animation, while conserving your device battery at the same time.


Optional pack, Sea Life Pack, is also available for in-app purchase to make Ocean Blue 3D much more exciting with more sea life and customization such as butterfly fish, tomato clown fish, manta ray, sea turtle and many more. Try it out now!


Email us if you have any inquiry, technical question or even suggestion. We love to hear from you.


Ocean Blue 3D is designed and developed by Kision Lab

title: Planet Ocean
description:
As an educational and useful tool, "Planet Ocean" lists 100 species of fish and seashells based on their origin, their stock and fishing techniques. It will help you identify and select the species managed sustainably.

As a bonus, you can watch the "Planet Ocean" movie by Yann Arthus-Bertrand and Michael Pitiot, as well as interviews and "making of" scenes.

You will also find recent news about the marine world through articles of GoodPlanet Info magazine, as well as consumer advice and cooking recipes.

Within its Ocean Program, The GoodPlanet Foundation has developed the "Planet Ocean" application to inform consumers about marine species and to promote sustainable fishing.

"Planet Ocean" was developed in partnership with Omega, with the collaboration of SeaWeb Europe.
